item.title: Raichur: Five Killed, Three Injured in Accident
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur: Five people were killed and three injured in a collision between a pickup vehicle and a mini passenger vehicle near Kannari Cross on Sindhanur-Siruguppa road late Tuesday evening.
According to preliminary police reports, all the victims are believed to be from a village near the Karnatakaâ€“Andhra Pradesh border, though this is yet to be confirmed.
The head-on collision occurred around 8.45 pm between the mini passenger vehicle carrying and a Bolero pickup transporting steel.
The decea...]]>
item.author: Gururaj A Paniyadi, About The Author, Principal Correspondent With Deccan Chronicle, Specializes In Covering Coastal, North Karnataka Districts. His Expertise Lies In Political Analysis, He Holds A Profound Interest In Human Interest Stories, History, Culture. Offering Extensive Coverage, Gururaj Explores Various Facets, Including Politics

item.title: Raichur Road Accident: 5 Killed in SUV Collision
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur road accident: 5 dead, 3 critical in head-on collision between two SUVs
Three people, who are in a critical condition, are admitted to Sindhanur Government Hospital....]]>
